# Load Data
```{r}
data_dir = "./data/"
asthma_data = read.csv(str_c(data_dir, "dc_census_tracts_asthma_equity_data.csv"))
places_data = read.csv(str_c(data_dir, "dc_cdc_places_tract_data.csv"))
svi_data = read.csv(str_c(data_dir, "dc_cdc_svi.csv"))
```


# Inspect Data

